history.proof: intros n m p H. apply Z.le_ge. srun best use: Z.ge_le, Zplus_le_compat_l.

exceptions.exn: In environment n, m, p : Z H : n >= m Unable to unify "(p + m ?= ?M1412) = Lt" with "(p + n ?= p + m) = Lt".
In environment n, m, p : Z H : n >= m Unable to unify "(?M1410 + ?M1412 ?= ?M1411 + ?M1413) = Gt" with "(p + n ?= p + m) = Lt".
In environment n, m, p : Z H : n >= m Unable to unify "(0 ?= ?M1410 + - ?M1411) = Gt" with "(p + n ?= p + m) = Lt".
The reference Zle_ge was not found in the current environment.
In environment n, m, p : Z H : n >= m Unable to unify "n >= m" with "p + m <= p + n".
In environment n, m, p : Z H : n >= m Unable to unify "p + n" with "p + m".
In environment n, m, p : Z H : n >= m Unable to unify "p + n" with "p + m".
In environment n, m, p : Z H : n >= m Unable to unify "n >= m" with "p + n >= p + m".
In environment n, m, p : Z H : n >= m Unable to unify "(?M1430 ?= ?M1430) = Gt" with "(p + n ?= p + m) = Lt".

original: intros n m p H. apply Zge_trans with (m:=m) (n:=Z.add p m). apply Z.add_le_mono. apply Zge_left. apply Zle_ge. apply H. apply Z.le_refl. apply Z.le_refl. apply Z.ge_le_iff. apply H. apply Z.le_refl.
